channel.title: 317[PI] help
channel.description: okay so i have a gate, that when i click on it, i want me to move me to a specific location. I also would like this gate to send dialogue when click. I have the code in, but whenever i click the gate, it freezes my client. here is the code [code] case 2815: c.getPA().movePlayer(3203, 3170, 0); c.getDH().sendNpcChat2("Well.. You have stumbled upon my traphouse..", "Try not to smoke too much crack..", c.talkingNpc, "Beale"); break;[/code] case 2815 is the gate, and the rest is self explanitory. i just would like to know why it is freezing my client. is the code [code]c.getDH().sendNpcChat2("Well.. You have stumbled upon my traphouse..", "Try not to smoke too much crack..", c.talkingNpc, "Beale");[/code] put in wrong? please help :confused: PS.. (There are no errors in the compiler..)

item.title: 317[PI] help
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

I fixed the issue guys. for those of you that may have this problem in the future… I solved it like this :

Original Code:c.getDH().sendNpcChat2("Well.. You have stumbled upon my traphouse..", "Try not to smoke too much crack..", c.talkingNpc, "Beale");

Fixed Code:

Thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: 317[PI] help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

It’s probably the dialogue freezing the client but it could be either…

Post the error you’re getting when the client freezes in order to get some help.

Read full topic

item.title: 317[PI] help
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[spoiler][quote=“Project Runescape, post:2, topic:550668”][quote author=beale link=topic=669580.msg4477428#msg4477428 date=1426907874]
okay so i have a gate, that when i click on it, i want me to move me to a specific location. I also would like this gate to send dialogue when click. I have the code in, but whenever i click the gate, it freezes my client. here is the code

case 2815: c.getPA().movePlayer(3203, 3170, 0); c.getDH().sendNpcChat2("Well.. You have stumbled upon my traphouse..", "Try not to smoke too much crack..", c.talkingNpc, "Beale"); break;
case 2815 is the gate, and the rest is self explanitory. i just would like to know why it is freezing my client. is the code c.getDH().sendNpcChat2("Well.. You have stumbled upon my traphouse..", "Try not to smoke too much crack..", c.talkingNpc, "Beale");
put in wrong? please help PS… (There are no errors in the compiler…)
[/quote]
in actionhandler.java search for public void firstClickObject under it add your code

[/quote][/spoiler]
my code is already under firstclickObject

Read full topic
